question:
The IPC applies to which of the following?
1. Any offence committed within the territory of India as defined in Article (1) of constitution.
2. Any offence committed within the territorial waters of India.
3. Any offence committed on any ship or aircraft either owned by India or registered in India.
Select the correct option from the codes given below:
explanation: The IPC applies to the following: (1) Any offence committed within the territory of India as defined in Article (1) of constitution, (2) Any offence committed within the territorial waters of India and (3) Any offence committed on any ship or aircraft either owned by India or registered in India.
